welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tuxtepec, Mexico, a charming city known for its beautiful rivers and lush landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Tuxtepec has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Crostinni Pasta & Vino
restaurants.description: Crostinni Pasta & Vino is a italian restaurant located in San Juan Bautista Tuxtepec.
restaurants.address: Miguel Hidalgo (Roberto Colorado y 18 de Marzo), Tuxtepec, Oaxaca

restaurants.name: Restaurante Pescador Cortes Y Mariscos
restaurants.description: Restaurante Pescador Cortes Y Mariscos is a steakhouse located in San Juan Bautista Tuxtepec.

restaurants.name: Carnitas "Michoacan"
restaurants.description: Carnitas "Michoacan" is a mexican restaurant located in San Juan Bautista Tuxtepec.
restaurants.address: San Juan Bautista Tuxtepec, OAX, Oaxaca

restaurants.name: Asadero La Estampida
restaurants.description: Asadero La Estampida is a steakhouse located in San Juan Bautista Tuxtepec.
restaurants.address: Francisco Fernández Arteaga N° 2730 (C. Rayon), 68300 Tuxtepec, Oaxaca

restaurants.name: El Taco Lupe
restaurants.description: El Taco Lupe is a taco restaurant located in San Juan Bautista Tuxtepec.
restaurants.address: Miguel Hidalgo (Av. 18 de Marzo), San Juan Bautista Tuxtepec, Oaxaca
